name: Eruca
overview: A collect'em-up style game where you slither around a complex environment avoiding obstacles and foes gathering up that which is good to eat. published in 64'er Sonderheft 73. Accompany the little worm on his excursion through the city park. There's enough to eat, but sneaky enemies are lurking everywhere. Is there anything more boring than constantly nibbling on the same apple? Eruca, hopeful offspring of the West Park worm tribe, is finally fed up: He wanted to see the world and is heading to the East End. If you want to accompany the creeper, you must play and help him survive.
